# README Update Assistant

Review the current README.md file and make updates to improve clarity, completeness, and alignment with the current state of the project. Ensure that all sections are up-to-date and accurately reflect the project's purpose, usage, and architecture.

## Update Instructions

### Format

- Use Markdown syntax for formatting.
- Ensure proper headings, lists, and links are used.

### Content

- Verify that the project description accurately reflects its purpose and scope.
- Update any usage instructions or examples to match the current implementation.
- Ensure that diagrams and use case references are correctly linked and described.
- Add any new sections that may enhance understanding, such as installation instructions, contribution guidelines, or FAQs.

#### Diagrams

Add architecture and use case diagrams if they are missing or outdated. Use Mermaid inline rather than text.

#### Structure

- Start with a brief project overview.
- Follow with a section on installation.
- Follow with a section on usage. Include end points and health/diagnostics if applicable.
- Follow with sections on use cases and architecture
